item.title: Comment on THREE Great Features of the Sanipath Tool by j.michiel@emory.edu
item.dc:creator: j.michiel@emory.edu
item.description: Hello, and apologies for not seeing this comment sooner--for information on specific deployments, including possible translations, please contact our project manager using the contact information in the footer of this website. Thank you!
item.content:encoded: Hello, and apologies for not seeing this comment sooner–for information on specific deployments, including possible translations, please contact our project manager using the contact information in the footer of this website. Thank you!

item.title: Comment on THREE Great Features of the Sanipath Tool by Mamadou Lamine DIARRA
item.dc:creator: Mamadou Lamine DIARRA
item.description: Very helpful tool for urban WASH workers. Is it possible to have a French version?
item.content:encoded: Very helpful tool for urban WASH workers. Is it possible to have a French version?
